      • resetScenario

        private Scenario resetScenario
        This scenario is initialised with the values from the selected scenario. If the user wants to reset changes, the values from this scenario will be loaded back to the selected scenario.

      • drawGUI

        private void drawGUI()
        Creates the graphical user interface. This method defines the look and feel of the scenario questionnaire.

      • resetScenarioChanges

        private void resetScenarioChanges()
        The reset button was pressed. This method will load the old values of the scenario, which are saved in the #resetScenario, back to the #tab.selectedScenario.

      • saveResetCopy

        private void saveResetCopy()
        Makes a deep copy of the selected scenario to be able to reset changes.

      • updatePanel

        public void updatePanel()
        Updates the questionnaire in case the selected scenario changed, or the scenario name changed.
